name: Other Half
description:
Other Half is a game which was created for the WSOA3004 Exam at Wits University. Other Half is a 2D platformer about duality. It follows the story of an angel and demon who are the last remaining survivors after a battle between their two coteries wiped out their existences. The remaining survivors are forced to work together and maneuver through the rubble on Earth in attempt to make it back home.

The team behind the game goes by 'Cosmic Drifters' and consists of:

Talitha James (the artist)
Nicole Song (the artist)
Lindiwe Mbuyisa (the designer)
Alexi Flerianos (the programmer)
Kamogelo Tselane (the project manager)/Kamo's Theory
